Reviews.Title: Batteries no longer charge-USELESS after one month!
Reviews.Author: Phil "Phil"
Reviews.Content: Nice design, but the cover for the 'sd' card broke off within a week.  Plus as stated in the title, BOTH batteries no longer hold a charge.

Reviews.Title: only me
Reviews.Author: supaman
Reviews.Content: Shortly after receiving it I noticed the charging cord was loose,a few days later it broke,I haven't been able to use it since,since I only had one charger to begin with

Reviews.Title: Not good!
Reviews.Author: roberto dumas og
Reviews.Content: It work only for two weeks . After two weeks its dead. Mp3 did not work and blue tooth too. Not really recomended. Its a waste of money.

Reviews.Title: N388 Unlocked 1.4 tounch screen watch mobile phone
Reviews.Author: Carol Young
Reviews.Content: The watch was an excellent present for someone who is a gadget nut.  It was simple to use so I have been told.  The watch itself looks just like any other watch.  The design was done so well that the wearer can wear it without be selfconcious about it.
